_comment: Slack MCP Integration - Boris Cherny Pattern
_instructions: Merge this into your .mcp.json to enable Slack notifications
_setup: 1. Go to https://api.slack.com/apps and create an app
2. Enable 'Incoming Webhooks' and create a webhook URL
3. Add the webhook URL to environment variables

slack._note: Official Anthropic Slack MCP - requires OAuth setup

slack-webhook._note: Custom webhook-based Slack MCP for simple notifications
